title: Root
description: Configuration for an APEX Nitro project

appURL.title: Application URL
appURL.description: This is the URL to your APEX application homepage.

srcFolder.title: Source Folder
srcFolder.description: This is where you do the coding. It should point to a local directory.

distFolder.title: Distributable Folder
distFolder.description: This is where the files will be compiled. It should point to a local directory.

js.title: JavaScript
js.description: Settings for serving JavaScript to your application.

processor.title: Processor
processor.description: Choose how your JavaScript will be processed. The webpack option allows to use ES6.

concat.title: Concatenate JavaScript Files
concat.description: Enable this to concatenate all your JavaScript files into one.

concatFilename.title: Concatenated JavaScript Filename
concatFilename.description: This is the name of the concatenated file.

entries.title: Entries
entries.description: A webpack entry would be an ES6 file that will be processed and compiled into a bundle (ES5 compatible).

bundleFilename.title: Bundled JavaScript Filename
bundleFilename.description: This is the name of the bundle file.

library.title: Expose as a library
library.description: Expose your bundles to your app as a global library.

libraryName.title: Library Name
libraryName.description: This is the name of the concatenated file.

tsConcat.title: Concatenate TypeScript Files
tsConcat.description: Enable this to concatenate all your TypeScript files into one.

tsConcatFilename.title: Concatenated TypeScript Filename
tsConcatFilename.description: This is the name of the concatenated file.

css.title: CSS
css.description: Settings for serving CSS to your application.

language.title: Language
language.description: Your source files stylesheet language. APEX Nitro will always generate CSS files out of these.

concat.title: Concatenate CSS Files
concat.description: Enable this to concatenate all your CSS files into one.

concatFilename.title: Concatenated CSS Filename
concatFilename.description: This is the name of the concatenated file.

sassIncludePath.title: Include Path
sassIncludePath.description: Include a path to an external Sass folder. Allows to use the `@import` feature from within that folder.

lessIncludePath.title: Include Path
lessIncludePath.description: Include a path to an external Less folder. Allows to use the `@import` feature from within that folder.

browsersync.title: Other
browsersync.description: Additionnal options when using APEX Nitro.

notify.title: Notify
notify.description: This option makes APEX Nitro alert you when a file is dynamically injected to you browser.

ghostMode.title: Ghost Mode
ghostMode.description: This option makes clicking, scrolling and typing being replicated on all devices.

header.title: Header
header.description: This feature adds an automatic comment block at the top of your CSS and JavaScript files with your project information.

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Enables the automatic header comment block feature.

apex.title: APEX Options
apex.description: Determines if the APEX builder should open alongside the application itself.

openBuilder.title: Open Builder
openBuilder.description: Opens the APEX builder when launching APEX Nitro.

publish.title: Publish Files
publish.description: Required if you want to publish your files to APEX automatically.

destination.title: APEX Files Destination
destination.description: This is used for the 'publish' feature and will determine where the files should be uploaded.

pluginName.title: Plugin Internal Name
pluginName.description: The internal name of the plugin is required to map the files to the correct plugin.

path.title: SQLcl Path
path.description: Enter the path to SQLcl. If it's been added to your environment variable, it should be `sql`. Otherwise enter a full path. Example: `/Users/vmorneau/sqlcl/bin/sql`

password.title: Password (Optional)
password.description: If you do not enter your password here, it will be prompted to you when using [apex-nitro publish project]

serviceName.title: Service Name
serviceName.description: Enter the [SERVICE NAME] for user/pass@db:port/[SERVICE NAME]

themeroller.title: Themeroller
themeroller.description: This feature will generate a `less` file that you can import into your application theme style. It will add editable variables to theme roller.

files.title: Files.
files.description: Include the list of `scss` or `less` files to be parsed by Theme Roller.
